name: Snapshot_chrome_extensions
pattern: {"query": "select u.username, ce.name,ce.identifier,ce.version,ce.description,ce.locale,ce.update_url,ce.author,ce.persistent,ce.path from chrome_extensions ce LEFT JOIN users u ON ce.uid = u.uid;", "interval": 28800, "description": "Snapshot Lists all chrome extensions - ATT&CK T1176", "snapshot": true}
